output.sentences: A new school just opened up, where children and teachers are considered equal.
Students share knowledge with children, and children share knowledge with kids.
This all takes place at a very old castle building, the caretaker of which had much respect for children.
After lunch, everyone played on the swings.
Volunteer parents helped keep an extra eye out for the childrens' safety.
